mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NM, PRUDUCT_INFO, CATEGORY, PRODUCT_COST, IMG ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')||'-'||'00'||#{category,jdbcType=NUMERIC}||'-'||to_char((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT), 'FM000'), #{productNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pruductInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{productCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET product_nm = #{productNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pruduct_info = #{pruductInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_cost = #{productCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, IMG = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NM as productNm, PRUDUCT_INFO as pruductInfo, CATEGORY, PRODUCT_COST as productCost, IMG
mapper.select: SELECT T1.* FROM ( SELECT B.rnum as num, B.PRODUCT_ID as productId , B.PRODUCT_NM as productNm, B.PRUDUCT_INFO as pruductInfo, B.CATEGORY, B.PRODUCT_COST as productCost, B.IMG FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum,A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE 1=1 and CATEGORY LIKE '%' || '1' || '%' )A WHERE rownum <= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNum}-1)+#{pageSize}) ) B WHERE B.rnum >= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNum}-1)+1) )T1
